entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
